dialogues.speaker: Leon
dialogues.message: Master Agnus, I have returned with the scroll I found in the mad wizard's lair.

dialogues.speaker: Agnus
dialogues.message: Ah, Leon. You've done well to retrieve it. Let me see...

dialogues.speaker: Agnus
dialogues.message: (Agnus examines the scroll, his brow furrowing in concern.)

dialogues.speaker: Agnus
dialogues.message: This is indeed the scroll Velius used to raise the dead. But as I feared, it requires an artifact that resonates with dark magic.

dialogues.speaker: Leon
dialogues.message: Do you happen to have an artifact that would work?

dialogues.speaker: Agnus
dialogues.message: No, I never dared to experiment with that darkness. Without an artifact, we cannot hope to banish the darkness that plagues Sylvanleaf Haven.

dialogues.speaker: Leon
dialogues.message: Would the skull of the skeleton brute have remnants of dakr magic, Master Agnus? After defeating the skeleton in the village, all that remained was its skull and the first scroll.

dialogues.speaker: Agnus
dialogues.message: That's the answer Leon! Velius must've expected we would try to reverse his curse, which is why he appeared in the village to secure the skull. The missing part is in his possession, guarded by his malevolent will.

dialogues.speaker: Leon
dialogues.message: If defeating Velius is the only way to obtain it. I must confront him and put an end to his reign of terror.

dialogues.speaker: Agnus
dialogues.message: Yes, Leon. The fate of our village rests upon your shoulders. But remember, Velius is a formidable foe. Prepare yourself well before facing him once again in the village. Seek allies, gather strength, and when you are ready, confront him with all the courage and determination you possess.

dialogues.speaker: Leon
dialogues.message: I will not fail, Master Agnus. Velius will answer for his crimes, and Sylvanleaf Haven will be free once more.

dialogues.speaker: Agnus
dialogues.message: Go forth, Leon. Once you defeat Velius come meet me at the altar of gods with the missing part of the scroll. Iâ€™ll perform the Ritual to lift this curse once and for all.
